meta.title: From FRIEND to SHIP
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: Welcome to **RUDDLE**! This week we're rebranding as the only Paul Rudd-themed daily word game. Today's puzzle is about his new movie Friendship, which is about to come out. It co-stars comedian Tim Robinson, of "I Think You Should Leave" fame. Raddle has received no compensation for this promotion, but as a fan of Rudd, Robinson, and the concept of friendship, I'm happy to do it.

ladder.clue: Pluralize ^ to get a TV show
Add a letter to ^ to get something you might make with a ^
Change the last letter of ^ to get something you might find in an aquarium
A ^ is this kind of animal
Remove the last letter of ^ and anagram to get a vessel
